critique: This document is an executive order amending a previous executive order regarding the inspection of tax returns. It primarily concerns the effective dates and applicability of these orders to state tax officials. There is no clear indication of ideological tilt, immigration stance, expansion of executive power, or a focus on national security vs. civil liberties. The document seems to be technical and administrative in nature, dealing with the specifics of tax return inspections by state officials. Therefore, most axes should be scored as neutral. The federalism aspect is slightly tilted towards federal control as it dictates how states can inspect federal tax returns.
